      • score

        public double score(float tfQuery,
           float tfDocument,
           float tfCollection,
           long numberOfTokens,
           int documentLength)
        DFR scoring for the given parameters. Scoring is done using the DFRee algorithm found in org.terrier.matching.models.DFRee
        Specified by:
        score in interface IScoringMethod
        Parameters:
        tfQuery - The term frequency of the term in the query
        tfDocument - The term frequency of the term in the document
        tfCollection - The term frequency of the term in the collection
        numberOfTokens - The total number of tokens in the collection
        documentLength - The length of the document, i.e. number of words in the document
        Returns:
